aufgabenblatt07

Class Roots

  • java.lang.Object
    • aufgabenblatt07.Roots

  • public class Roots
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses newtons method to estimate roots of a function

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double EPSILON
      if |f(x)| is less than or equal to EPSILON, then x is root
      private Function function
      the function to perform calculations on
      private int MAX_ITERATIONS
      maximum number of iterations before an exception is thrown

      finds the closest root to a starting value

      returns a sorted List of Doubles containing all the roots hat were randomly found in the given interval

      returns a random double between min and max

    • Method Detail

      • findRoot

        public double findRoot(double startingValue)
                throws NoRootFoundException
        finds the closest root to a starting value
        Parameters:
        startingValue - the value to start newtons method at
        Returns:
        the x value of the closest root
        Throws:
        NoRootFoundException - no root could be found

      • findRootsRandomised

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> findRootsRandomised(int min,
                                                            int max,
                                                            int numberOfTries)
        returns a sorted List of Doubles containing all the roots hat were randomly found in the given interval
        Parameters:
        min - lower boundary of search interval
        max - upper boundary of search interval
        numberOfTries - the number of tries to find a new root
        Returns:
        sorted list of roots

      • getRandomDoubleInInterval

        private double getRandomDoubleInInterval(int min,
                                         int max)
        returns a random double between min and max
        Parameters:
        min - lower boundary of interval
        max - upper boundary of interval
        Returns:
        a random double bewtween min and max
